Articles.Content:
I am playing with my niece and I would greatly appreciate at least one female Kerbonaut.

Some suggested names:

Valentina Kerbishkova (Tribute to Valentina Tereshkova)

Svetlana Savitskerba (Tribute to Svetlana Savitskaya)

Sally Rocket (Tribute to Sally Ride)

Here's a list, as I am terrible at the punny names: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_female_astronauts

Someone suggested Marilyn Munroe as well.

The kerbins are really fun to look at, and I'd imagine female Kerbins look nearly identical to the male ones. Someone

already made a nice fan art (http://vladoportos.sk/wp-content/uploads/odyssey2desktop.png)

I myself would be a fan of the funny lipstick on a pig look, but that's my sense of humor.

Sorry to bother you with this.

It seems I didn't read the sticky like a bumbling fool.

Sorry to waste the space, can this be closed?

[Removed to protect innocent minds]

You mean like this, and yes it has been spoken of a lot of tomes but it seems as there is no interest by the devs in female kerbonauts

Edited November 24, 2013 by sal_vager
Actually kerbals don't have defined gender, male or female

Female Kerbals are on the what not to suggest list.

Thread locked, have a nice day.

Buzz Kerbin, just to add to this, Squad know that players want female Kerbals but this is not expected to occur at this time, remember that KSP is still being actively developed, please be patient.

matts73, sick dude and not in the good way :/
